named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.userName = ?1 AND p.pending <> TRUE

named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByUserName&Pending
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.userName = ?1 AND p.pending = TRUE

named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByWeblogId
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.weblogId = ?1 AND p.pending <> TRUE

named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByWeblogId&Pending
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.weblogId = ?1 AND p.pending = TRUE

named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByWeblogIdIncludingPending
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.weblogId = ?1

named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByUserName&WeblogId
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.userName = ?1 AND p.weblogId = ?2 AND p.pending <> true

named-query.name: UserWeblogRole.getByUserName&WeblogIdIncludingPending
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM UserWeblogRole p WHERE p.userName = ?1 AND p.weblogId = ?2
